LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.description: Залежно від якості ритуалу, учасники отримають від {MINMOOD} до {MAXMOOD} настрій на {MOODDAYS} днів.
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.0.des: {0} пройшло жахливо The speech was boring and it was disrespectful of their legacy.
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.1.des: {0} пройшло нудно The speech was long-winded and did not honour them.
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.2.des: {0} пройшло Добре The speaker's final words provided a path for everyone to move on.
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.3.des: {0} пройшло неймовірно The speech was captivating and heartfelt, and everyone came away focused on good memories.
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.comps.0.label: присутній моральний наставник
LanguageData.AM_SkyBurialOutcome.comps.1.label: кількість учасників
